name: paq
description: Multithreaded tool for running node.js style code in the browser inspired by substack's Browserify.

scripts.test: t="/paq-tests" && d=$(xcodebuild -project paq.xcodeproj -showBuildSettings | grep CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR | cut -c31-) && c=$d$t && f="${c/Release/Debug}" && xctool -project paq.xcodeproj -scheme paq-tests -sdk macosx build && eval "$f"
scripts.compile: t="/paq" && d=$(xcodebuild -project paq.xcodeproj -showBuildSettings | grep CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR | cut -c31-) && c=$d$t && xctool -project paq.xcodeproj -configuration release -scheme paq -sdk macosx build  && mkdir -p bin && mv $c bin

author: Ben Ng <me@benng.me>
